name: Chicken and Egg Escape
description:
Chicken and egg must work together to escape the barn! Switch between two characters, using their traits in tandem to move forward. The chicken has limited stamina, and the egg will crack if thrown too many times, so plan your moves carefully. 

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2022.

Controls: 

A/D — move left/right 

Space — jump 

Left mouse button — throw egg 

Right mouse button — switch characters 

R — reset game 

Bring chicken and egg to a nest together to restore stamina and damage.

Credits: 

Tristan Durocher - programming and game design

Noah MacDonald - art and game design

Aaron Scott - audio, game design, and level design

Repository Link:
